item.title: Trump vs. deep state: Tiny agency takes an oversized role in battle over aid

item.title: Democratic Rep. Raul Grijalva, 77, dies after battle with lung cancer
item.description: Longtime Democratic Rep. Raul Grijalva has died at 77 after a "long brave battle" with lung cancer, his office announced in a statement Thursday.

item.title: Biggs seeks FBI probe into Democrat fundraising apparatus ActBlue
item.description: A House Republican lawmaker Thursday called on the FBI to begin an inquiry into the main fundraising apparatus of the Democratic Party.
